channel.title: Axoloti as Sound Card for Raspberry Pi?
channel.description:
Is it possible to use Axoloti as a high quality sound card for Raspberry Pi by soldering them together? I am interested because my Pi is bare and uses the standard sound card that comes with it and I wanted to interface the two boards and be able to patch audio from the Pi within the Axoloti patcher while leaving the audio input of the Axoloti free for other things. Any way this can be done?
Best, Oren

item.title: Axoloti as Sound Card for Raspberry Pi?
item.dc:creator: @orenpine Oren Pine
item.description:
@orenpine wrote:

Thanks for the reply!
